txt.en: Edash has confirmed the poison that coats the enemy's arrows. Time is running out to craft the antidote.
'Yes, yes. Excellent. Bring it here! Time runs short!'
'Every moment that passes brings our fallen brothers closer to death.'
Edash is located in Amd√¢n.\n\nBring the healing moss to Edash.
Twistbeard can found on rocks in Azanulbizar.\n\nEdash has tasked you with gathering twistbeard moss.

'I have inspected the samples you brought and it is as I suspected. Which is both good and very, very bad. Bad, because left untreated every single one of these warriors will perish. Good, because I know the antidote.\n\n'It shall not be a pleasant task for you, but their lives hang in balance. A moss grows in this valley, Asfurtarg, sometimes called twistbeard. Bring me as much as you can find, and do be quick about it!'
